summary.description: TLS Motion Determination analyzes a macromolecular crystal structure for evidence of flexibility, e.g. local or inter-domain motions. It does this by partitioning individual chains into multiple segments that are modeled as rigid bodies undergoing TLS (Translation/Libration/Screw) vibrational motion. It generates all possible partitions up to a maximum number of segments.
summary.name: TLS Motion Determination
